alert.note: Alert for Conway; Perry (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 25 at 2:37PM CDT until March 27 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River At Morrilton affecting Conway and Perry Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River At Morrilton. * WHEN...From this evening to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 30.0 feet, Commercial and industrial establishments downstream of the State Highway 9 Bridge are effected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 29.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Saturday evening to a crest of 30.0 feet. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 30.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue Crest Time Date Arkansas River Morrilton 30.0 29.7 Sat 2 PM 29.3 21.7 20.8 30.0 7 PM 3/25 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
